meanings.definition: A group of drugs used to treat certain mental and emotional disorders.

meanings.sent3: After taking chlorpromazines, I felt like my mind was getting a helpful boost.

meanings.definition: A type of medication that can help control symptoms of schizophrenia.

meanings.sent2: He noticed an improvement in his condition after starting chlorpromazines.
meanings.sent3: The chlorpromazines seemed to have a magical effect on his hallucinations.
meanings.sent4: Her mind cleared up like a fog lifting after taking chlorpromazines.
meanings.sent5: The chlorpromazines were like a shield against the chaos of schizophrenia.
